Text:
Let's figure this out: you collected a large number of pictures from a image hosting site, put them all in a huge ball and offered the result to the world?

If you are going to compress your files, you really should show a few samples in a separate folder.

O.K. an eclectic collection of assorted downloaded porn. For some unfathomable reason they have all been renamed to "Phap ####.jpg"
Some fair pictures, some skank, soft core, hard core, some pro, some amateur.

Looks like a lot of personal editing would be required to sort and organize them as they have all been dumped into a single folder before being packaged in the Tar file.
